sentences.english: Wooden computer case inspired by the Steampunk movement.
sentences.chinese: 由蒸汽朋克运动所启发的木质电脑机箱。

sentences.english: The chassis is open while the power is on.
sentences.chinese: 电源开启状态下机箱打开。

sentences.english: This post showcases the most creative and original case mods.
sentences.chinese: 接下来我们会看到最有创新性和原创的机箱设计。

sentences.english: Remove the cartridge, the case cover and the small cover.
sentences.chinese: 卸下墨盒和左侧机箱头盖及后小盖板。

sentences.english: On the inside of the case, they are connected to expansion cards.
sentences.chinese: 在其机箱内部，与扩展卡连接。

sentences.english: Unusual computer case made from a strong layer of concrete.
sentences.chinese: 用坚固的混凝土制作的不同寻常的电脑机箱。

sentences.english: Make one case for desktop systems and another for laptops.
sentences.chinese: 为台式机系列和笔记本分别制定统一机箱。
坚固美观的外壳，标准2U机箱设计。

sentences.english: This cool PC case is actually a mini version of a real motorcycle.
sentences.chinese: 这个很酷的电脑机箱实际上是真实摩托车的迷你版本。

sentences.english: The metal plate used to fasten an add-in card to the system chassis.
sentences.chinese: 用来把插卡固定到系统机箱上的金属板。

sentences.english: What's new is the composite front bulkhead and rear chassis plate.
sentences.chinese: 有什么新内容，是综合前面的舱壁和后方的机箱钢板。

sentences.english: Just install a beer bottle opener on the side of the chassis.
sentences.chinese: 只需安装一对机箱侧面啤酒开瓶器。

sentences.english: It is usually used Suction chassis in front of, behind and at the top of the ventilation.
sentences.chinese: 通常采用的做法是机箱的前面吸风，后面和顶部抽风。

sentences.english: Many hardware enthusiasts love to design and create unique cases for their computers.
sentences.chinese: 很多电脑发烧友喜欢为自己的电脑设计独特的机箱。

sentences.english: Case modding is not an easy, fast process if done correctly.
sentences.chinese: 机箱改造若按正确的步骤进行，绝非易事。

sentences.english: Dual mono construction with each channel in a separate chassis.
sentences.chinese: 双单声道设计，每个声道在分开的机箱上。

definition: radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)
CD or DVD Drive/abbr. for 光盤驅動器|光盘驱动器
Micro-Star International (MSI), Taiwanese computer hardware company
case, casing, cabinet or housing (of a computer, photocopier etc)
